wikipedia_page.main: Michael Gibson (born 29 October 1980 in Blackburn, Lancashire) is a TV presenter and documentary director. He presented the MTV Select television program which aired weekday afternoons on MTV across Europe.

response: *Michael Gibson, (born 1980), television presenter and documentary director
